original: Ahrmfeldt, Erik Hjalmar, civilingenjör, Kalmar, f. 4/5/02 i Pitkäranta, Vib. 1., Finl., av ing. A. H. R. A. o. Edit Eriksson. G. 37 m. Anna Melan-der. Barn: Gärd f. 39, Louise 41. — Stud:ex. i Västerås 22, avg:ex. fr. KTH (E) 30. An’S:t. v. Porjus’ kraftv. 30-31, v. ASEA 31-36, Sö. Sv:es ång-pannefören. 35-39, tekn. chef f. A-B Elgajo i Sthlm 39-45, h. Dahlbergs El. A-B i Kalmar fr. 45. Led. av Sv. tekn:fören. 30. Medl. av Frimurarorden. Hobby: frimarken.
translated: Ahrmfeldt, Erik Hjalmar, engineer, Kalmar, b. 4/5/02 in Pitkäranta, Vib. 1., Finl., son of engineer A. H. R. A. and Edit Eriksson. Married in 1937 to Anna Melander, two children: Gärd b. 39, Louise b. 41. Education: graduated from Västerås in 1922, completed KTH (E) in 1930. Worked at Porjus power plant in 1930-31, at ASEA in 1931-36, at Södra Sveriges Ångpanneförening in 1935-39, was technical manager for A-B Elgajo in Stockholm in 1939-45, and then joined Dahlbergs Elektriska A-B in Kalmar in 1945. He was a member of Svenska Teknologföreningen in 1930 and a member of the Freemasonry. His hobby was stamp collecting.
